I’m only sorry that it took so long to figure out   Chorus Outro  e|------------------------------| B|-----0–1–3–1–0------------| G|–2-----------------2–0------| D|------------------------------| A|------------------------------| E|------------------------------|  Outro  e|------------------------------| B|---------0------1-------------| G|–0–2h-----------------------| D|----------------2-------------| A|----------------3-------------| E|------------------------------|   Drive out with the sun in your eyes You wasted my time It’s true, it’s true My god, don’t you hold out your hand I called off my plans I counted on you, on you And if you’re ever left with any doubt What you live with and what you’ll do without I’m only sorry that it took so long to figure out

(oooo oooo oooo)

Got lost in the places I’ve been I should go out with my friends I’d go tonight but I know you’ll be there too, there too For me, this bottle of wine Is to slow down my mind And forget the things that I knew, I knew And if you’re ever left with any doubt What you live with and what you’ll do without I’m only sorry that it took so long to figure out (oooo oooo oooo)
